description.value:
Gives +10 to Medicae Skill when used for first-aid. Best Craftsmanship gives +20.

Requirements

Containins Needles, scalpels, bandages, antiseptics, gauzes, painkillers, flesh spray, wound glue, etc. Good for minor wounds.

Effect: Common

Notes: -
description.summary: Gives +10 to Medicae Skill when used for first-aid. Best Craftsmanship gives +20.
